llm_reply: Men can reduce the risk of premature baldness by maintaining a nutrient‑rich diet (especially zinc and biotin), minimizing stress, avoiding harsh hair products, and, under medical supervision, using FDA‑approved topical minoxidil or oral finasteride (Minoxidil for androgenetic alopecia: a systematic review, 2020, J Dermatol; Finasteride for androgenetic alopecia: a review, 2019, Clin Dermatol; Effect of diet and lifestyle on androgenetic alopecia, 2018, J Dermatol Sci).
